name: Will Ainsworth
bio: Will Ainsworth is the 31st Lieutenant Governor of Alabama. A former youth pastor, entrepreneur, and cattle farmer, he previously served in the Alabama House from 2014 to 2018. He is known for championing education reform, election integrity, and military support.
endorsements: Alabama Retail Association PAC, Marco Rubio 2016 Campaign Chair (Alabama)
platform: School choice expansion, grocery tax repeal, skilled trades education, military support, and government transparency.

platformFollowThrough.CHOOSE Act: Expanded school choice options across Alabama
platformFollowThrough.Grocery Tax Cut: Reduced state sales tax on groceries

proposals: Repeal grocery tax entirely, expand Pre-K access, and streamline workforce credentialing.
engagement: High engagement through military legislation, education reform, and economic development commissions.
